title: Intelligent Asset Retrieval System Using Milvus, FastAPI and watsonx.ai integration
author: S Siva Santosh
description: This project integrates Milvus, a highly efficient vector database, with FastAPI, a modern web framework, to create an intelligent search application. It leverages state-of-the-art natural language processing models, such as sentence-transformers, to handle search queries for asset retrieval, focusing on metadata like authors, descriptions, and technical keywords. The search system also supports entity extraction and searches for AWS-specific assets like S3-compliant buckets, enhancing the relevance of search results. Additionally, the project uses IBM Watson Machine Learning for enhanced search capabilities.
